fields.name: Prayer
fields.value: Don't forget to pray daily. God wants you to pray and talk with Him.

fields.name: Thessalonians 5:17-18
fields.value:
17 Pray without ceasing.

18 In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.

fields.name: 1 Timothy 2:8
fields.value: 8 I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

fields.name: Bible Reading
fields.value: Don't forget to read the bible daily and to study it.

fields.name: Ecclesiastes 12:12
fields.value: 12 And further, by these, my son, be admonished: of making many books there is no end; and much study is a weariness of the flesh.

fields.name: 2 Timothy 2:15
fields.value: 15 Study to shew thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth.

fields.name: Fellowship
fields.value: Don't forget to be socially active with other true Christians.

fields.name: Acts 2:42
fields.value: 42 And they continued stedfastly in the apostles' doctrine and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and in prayers.

fields.name: Hebrews 10:24-25
fields.value:
24 And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works:

25 Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together, as the manner of some is; but exhorting one another: and so much the more, as ye see the day approaching.
